Query BLM library with the given search parameters

blm_query.Rd

Query BLM library with the given search parameters

blm_query(
  query = NULL,
  years = NULL,
  mediatypes = NULL,
  subjects = NULL,
  creators = NULL,
  languages = NULL
)

Arguments

query

string, no vector
years

string
mediatypes

string
subjects

string
creators

string
languages

string

Value

dataframe title, link

Examples

blm_query(query = "wildlife", subjects = c("Wildlife conservation", "land"))
